name: Balls Shotter
description:
The very first game that I make. You control a cube that shoot circles. But your can't move normally ( like by WASD or arrows ). Well, read the Rules in the game for more detals (may be :V)

Please leave comment about what you think about my game, so I can know my what I'm doing wrong or bad. Thank for playing :)

I recommend using 1920 x 1080 screen, it's perfect for this game.

Btw, there aren't any music yet, I can't find any music that fit to the game, may be I'll add it later.
